channel.title: Zoo Tycoon Mod Vault on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Zoo Tycoon Mod Vault on ZooBerry

item.title: Shout
item.description: Zooberry is a Zoo Tycoon mod repository dedicated to conserving mods once hosted by Zoomania, Northern Skies, and Artifex. If you’re interested in learning a little more about why this website exists, check out the about section. Though we are currently not accepting new files for hosting, you are welcome to reach out at zooberry@goosifer.io and we’ll get back to you if things change.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Want to host your mods here on the Zoo Vault? Feel free to reach out by email :)

item.title: Resume
item.description: Here is a fantastic list of things I have accomplished in life! :D: nothing nothing again and even more nothing

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the ZooBerry Who are you? My name is Goosifer out in the ’nets, but you may call me Eric. Back in the day I used to run Zoomania and Northern Skies, and was also a freshman member of the Artifex modding team (you may try your best to guess which one, I wasn’t very prolific :P). Each of these websites had their own storied histories and ultimately each came down to a team effort to keep the lights on.
